title: This Is the New Testament Week 3 with Jennifer Lucy Tyler
description:
It’s the third week of This Is the New Testament, and Raechel and Amanda are joined by Jennifer Lucy Tyler, a speaker, ministry leader, and fellow lover of God’s Word. Together, they look at five more of Paul’s epistles and explore questions like, “What does it look like for God to direct our hearts?” and “How do we endure suffering faithfully in Christ?” Listen along as their conversation reminds us that, no matter our circumstances, the Lord is our hope, and it is Christ who strengthens and sustains us. 


Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 3 of the She Reads Truth This Is the New Testament reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop the This Is the New Testament collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/this-is-the-new-testament-week-3-with-jennifer-lucy-tyler
